name: viewCells
description: Read the values of cells within a specified range in the active Excel worksheet. Use this tool to view current spreadsheet data before making changes or to understand the spreadsheet structure.

cells.description: Cell range to read in A1 notation (e.g., 'A1', 'A1:C3', 'B2:D5'). Can be a single cell or a range of cells.

name: editCells
description: Update the values of cells within a specified range in the active Excel worksheet. Use this tool to modify spreadsheet data, enter formulas, or update existing values.

cells.description: Cell range to update in A1 notation (e.g., 'A1', 'A1:C3', 'B2:D5'). The range must match the dimensions of the data array.

data.description: 2D array of values to write to the specified cell range. For a single cell, use [[value]]. For multiple cells, each sub-array represents a row of values.
